UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

role.description: The user's role within the organization (e.g., Chairperson, Treasurer, Coordinator, Investment Lead, Member, Pending).

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

status.description: The current status of the user's account.

treasurerApproved.description: Indicates if the treasurer has approved the user.

chairpersonApproved.description: Indicates if the chairperson has approved the user.

FinancialYear.title: FinancialYear
FinancialYear.description: Represents a financial year for tracking contributions.

id.description: Unique identifier for the financial year.

startDate.description: The starting date of the financial year.

endDate.description: The ending date of the financial year.

id.description: Unique identifier for the contribution record.

amount.description: The contribution amount for the month.

SpecialContribution.title: SpecialContribution
SpecialContribution.description: Represents a member's special contribution, like a miniharambee.

id.description: Unique identifier for the special contribution record.

date.description: The date of the special contribution.

month.description: The month of the special contribution (0-11).

year.description: The year of the special contribution.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: Represents an event created by the coordinator.

description.description: A detailed description of the event.

date.description: The date and time of the event.

id.description: Unique identifier for the constitution document.

content.description: A URL to the constitution document in Firebase Storage.

fileName.description: The name of the uploaded constitution file.

uploadDate.description: The date when the constitution was uploaded.

InvestmentReport.title: InvestmentReport
InvestmentReport.description: Represents a report on investments done by the group.

id.description: Unique identifier for the investment report.

title.description: The title of the investment report.

content.description: The content of the investment report (can be stored as text or a link to cloud storage).

uploadDate.description: The date when the investment report was uploaded.

InvestmentIdea.title: InvestmentIdea
InvestmentIdea.description: Represents an AI-generated investment idea saved by an Investment Lead.

id.description: Unique identifier for the saved idea.

content.description: The markdown content of the investment idea.

savedBy.description: The user ID of the Investment Lead who saved the idea.

savedDate.description: The date when the idea was saved.

Poll.title: Poll
Poll.description: Represents a poll created by a member.

options.description: The options for the poll, including text and vote counts.

creatorId.description: The ID of the user who created the poll.

startDate.description: The date and time when the poll starts.

endDate.description: The date and time when the poll ends.

voters.description: A list of users who have voted, storing their public profile information.

Vote.title: Vote
Vote.description: Represents a user's vote in a poll.

selectedOption.description: The option ID selected by the user.

voteDate.description: The date and time when the vote was cast.

id.description: Unique identifier for the meeting minute.

title.description: The title of the meeting minute.

content.description: The text content of the minute, if typed directly.

fileUrl.description: A URL to the minute document in Firebase Storage.

fileName.description: The name of the uploaded minute file.

uploadedBy.description: The ID of the user (Secretary) who uploaded the minute.

uploadDate.description: The date when the minute was uploaded.

title.description: The title or reason for the expenditure.

description.description: A brief description of the expenditure.

recordedBy.description: The ID of the user (Treasurer) who recorded the expenditure.

MiscellaneousIncome.title: MiscellaneousIncome
MiscellaneousIncome.description: Represents miscellaneous group income like fees, fines, or loan interest.

id.description: Unique identifier for the income record.

description.description: A brief description of the income source.

date.description: The date the income was received.

memberId.description: The ID of the member associated with the income (optional, e.g., for fines).

recordedBy.description: The ID of the user (Treasurer) who recorded the income.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to manage user profiles, financial years, contributions, special contributions, events, constitution, investment reports, polls, and votes for The Empowers youth group. User roles (Admin, Chairperson, Treasurer, Coordinator, Secretary, Investment Lead, Member) are managed via role-based access control rules defined for each collection. This ensures that only authorized users can perform specific actions (e.g., only a Treasurer can update contributions, only an Admin can manage users). A collection group query rule has been added for 'specialContributions' to allow Treasurers to list all of them across all users. This design adheres to the principles of Authorization Independence, Clarity of Intent, and least privilege.
